name: BH Custom Preloader
author: Masum Billah

sections.description:
BH Custom Preloader is a jQuery Custom Preloader for your wordpress website. This plugin will enable awesome custom Preloader.

You can change preloader image, Upload your desire image, preloader body backgrond color,preloader effects, preloader speed & other settings & by using the options of this plugin.

Features:

  • Easy Installation
  • Plug and Play
  • Css3 Preloader
  • 28 Preloader Images Included
  • Admin Option
  • Body Background Color Options
  • And Much More options ………

Our Premium Version is Available with more Functionality

Premium Version only $8

Documentation:

After install, the plugin will add a menu under Settings called “BH Custom Preloader Settings”.

In this settings, you can configure images. Lets describe.

CSS3 Preloader

Css3 Preloader included in Latest Version.

Preloader Images

You can change preloader image here. you will be see many images there, just select any one of these.

Upload Preloader Images

You can upload your desire preloader image here. Image size will be maximum width: 200px and maximum height : 200px.

Active Home Page Only

You can Active/Inactive Home Page Only option

Preloader background color

You can Select Preloader background color here. Please use px. Example: #ffffff

Preloader Delay time

You can Select Preloader Delay time here. Only use number. Default value is 350. Example: 350

Preloader body Opacity

You can Select Preloader body Opacity here. Default value is 1. Example: 1

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload bh-custom-preloader to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings menus change option what you want.
sections.faq:
Can i use this Plugin in any version of wordpress ?

Yes. You can use this in any version of wordpress.

How i can use this plugin ?

After install, the plugin will add a menu under Settings called “BH Custom Preloader Settings”, from here you can change everythings
sections.changelog:
• 2.0 – Added Setting Link and Fixed Issues
  • 1.9 – Updated Plugin Files
  • 1.8 – Fixed plugin security Issues
  • 1.7 – Fixed plugin security Issues
  • 1.5 – Fixed plugin security Issues
  • 1.5 – Updated Plugin Dashboard options and added Css3 Preloader
sections.reviews:
No support and didn't work with DIVI

By webjive on April 8, 2017

I purchased this plugin, then loaded it in a DIVI site. The free plugin worked but the paid did not. I sent a support request but never heard back.

Exactly what I needed!

By danniemacl on September 3, 2016

I purchased the pro version of this plug-in for $5 and it is so worth it!

Excellent support - I emailed the author asking how to change a setting (the length of time for the custom image preloader to fade) and he rewrote the option in to the plug-in for me.

Thank you so much!

Really cool

By marcodimitri1 on September 3, 2016

Just perfect, thanks

short_description: This is BH Custom Preloader  plugin.It will be enable Preloader on your web site. You can change Every things from preloader settings
